outline.title: Mars NFT Land
outline.summary: Title slide introducing Mars NFT Land as a strategic proposal for SpaceX, emphasizing tokenization, community empowerment, and discovery acceleration.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/cosmorwa_platform/client/public/images/pitch-title-slide.jpg - Image 4 shows Mars covered in a digital grid and a rocket (Starship-like), perfectly illustrating the concept of 'Mars NFT Land' and 'Tokenizing Mars Exploration' for the title slide.

outline.title: The Problem
outline.summary: Current Mars exploration challenges: data bottlenecks, community disconnect, funding constraints, and competitive pressure from other space agencies.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/cosmorwa_platform/client/public/images/pitch-problem-slide.jpg - Image 5 is a direct comparison graphic contrasting 'Centralized Mars Exploration' with 'Decentralized Mars Exploration,' which directly addresses the 'Problem' of centralized, slow, and expensive exploration and sets up the solution.

outline.title: The Opportunity
outline.summary: Market convergence in 2026: NFT maturation, Mars readiness, and community engagement create the perfect window for Mars NFT Land.

outline.title: The Solution
outline.summary: Three-phase system overview: Tokenization (NFT parcels), Prediction (crowdsourced algorithms), Discovery (real-time events).
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/cosmorwa_platform/client/public/images/mars-mapping-hero.jpg - Image 1 shows a Mars landscape overlaid with a hexagonal grid, resource analysis data, and rovers, visually representing the 'Three-Phase System' and the data-driven nature of the solution.

outline.title: Phase 1: Tokenization
outline.summary: Mars surface divided into 1M+ NFT parcels with real coordinates, geological data, and blockchain permanence.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/cosmorwa_platform/client/public/images/mars-nft-grid.jpg - Image 2 shows a digital grid on a planetary surface with coordinates, 'Owned' and 'For Sale' labels, and resource indicators (Water, Minerals), which is a perfect visual for the 'Mars Grid NFT System' and Phase 1: Tokenization.

outline.title: Phase 2: Prediction
outline.summary: Community members develop algorithms to predict landing sites, generating massive dataset for SpaceX ML/AI.

outline.title: Phase 3: Discovery
outline.summary: Real-time rover landing events trigger NFT value changes, creating dynamic marketplace and community engagement.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/cosmorwa_platform/client/public/images/mars-discovery-event.jpg - Image 3 shows a spacecraft landing on Mars with an 'ALERT: TOUCHDOWN CONFIRMED' and 'NEW DISCOVERY SITE' data overlay, perfectly illustrating the 'Phase 3 - Discovery' and 'Real-Time Exploration Events.'

outline.title: Value for SpaceX
outline.summary: Five key benefits: data generation, community engagement, exploration acceleration, revenue streams, strategic positioning.

outline.title: Financial Projections
outline.summary: Conservative Year 1-3 projections: $55.7M → $277M → $585M+ revenue with strong profitability.

outline.title: Implementation Roadmap
outline.summary: Phase-by-phase execution from Q1 2026 foundation through 2027+ scaling with clear milestones.

outline.title: Competitive Advantages
outline.summary: Unique moat: SpaceX's Mars data access, first-mover advantage, network effects, and Elon Musk brand power.

outline.title: Team & Resources
outline.summary: 11-13 person team required across technical, business, and support functions with $3-5M Year 1 budget.

outline.title: Risks & Mitigation
outline.summary: Key risks (regulatory, adoption, technical, competition) with specific mitigation strategies.

outline.title: Why Now? Why SpaceX?
outline.summary: Perfect timing: SpaceX's Mars missions, data access, credibility, community, and innovation culture.

outline.title: The Vision
outline.summary: Closing vision: 100M people owning Mars land, participating in exploration, building humanity's multi-planetary future.
